title: Foreign currency appreciates, cuts trade deficit

content.prompt: An increase in which of the following would reduce the United States balance-of-trade deficit?

choices.label: United States rate of inflation compared to other countries
The value of foreign currency relative to the United States dollar
United States interest rates compared to other countries
